title: The Forsaken

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Forsaken is a music track that is unlocked in the Lithkren Vault during Dragon Slayer II.

The Forsaken (#553)

The Forsaken is a music track that is unlocked in the Lithkren Vault during Dragon Slayer II.
